stories.title: U.S. Government Demanding Confidential Information of Semiconductor Companies

stories.text:
I have been listening to A LOT of Darknet Diaries [0] lately. Jack's latest 2 part episode on Citizen lab [1] and the NSO [2] has me concerned about my family's cyber security status.

We use 1Password, complex passwords, MFA where ever possible. We also have mostly Apple devices and I'm always making sure updates are installed. But the more I learn, the more it seems that isn't enough. Some research shows there are lots of products/services out there monitoring/protecting business/enterprise (e.g. CloudStrike) but is there a product/service that exists specifically geared for individuals/families? Thanks!

[0] - https://darknetdiaries.com [1] - https://darknetdiaries.com/episode/99 [2] - https://darknetdiaries.com/episode/100
